Table of Contents

NAME

sqtocbk - convert from scalar quantizer to VQ codebook format

SYNOPSIS

sqtocbk sqfile cbkfile

DESCRIPTION

sqtocbk converts from the scalar-quantizer format (SQ) used by scalar-quantization routines (see QccPackSQ(3) ) to the VQ-codebook format (CBK) used by vector-quantization routines. The resulting VQ codebook, cbkfile, contains one-dimensional codewords.

SEE ALSO

QccPackSQ(3) , QccPackVQ(3) , QccPack(3)

AUTHOR
